listen_notes_episodes.title: "House republicans release draft bill to regulate stablecoins" Feb 08, 2025
listen_notes_episodes.description:
Today's blockchain and cryptocurrency news 
Bitcoin is down slightly at $96,060
Eth is down slightly at $2,604
XRP, up slightly at $2.40
SEC delays decision on BlackRock iShares ETH Trust
House republicans release draft bill to regulate stablecoins.
Florida senator files bill proposing state invest in BTC
BlackRock now owns 5% of Strategy (formerly MSTR)
DarkFi launches alpha 
Kanye West mentions crypto in X tirade.
Loopify raises funds for humanitarian efforts in Gaza

listen_notes_episodes.title: S2. Ep. 4: Web3 at New Zealand All Blacks and Beyond Ft. Leanne Bats
listen_notes_episodes.description: In S2 Ep. 4 of the Sporting Crypto Podcast, we talk to Leanne Bats about New Zealand Rugby, rights holders and connecting/monetizing fans through Web3.

listen_notes_episodes.title: DeFi Decoded - Trump's Tariff Tantrum Tosses Cold Water on Crypto Rally (for now)
listen_notes_episodes.description: Join Alex Tapscott and Andrew Young as they decode the world of Web3 and DeFi. Listen in as they discuss the current macroeconomic landscape and its impact on crypto, recent regulatory updates from Washington, the potential establishment of a U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve, Ethereum's loss of Ultra-Sound Money status after the Dencun network upgrade, the current market structure dynamics and where we go from here, and more.

listen_notes_episodes.title: AUSTRIAN ECONOMICS & BITCOIN vs FIAT ECONOMICS | Rahim Taghizadegan (THE Bitcoin Podcast)
listen_notes_episodes.description:
"Politicians realize that they need Bitcoin now or may need Bitcoin and that's really the story here."
On this Bitcoin Talk episode of THE Bitcoin Podcast, Walker talks with Rahim Taghizadegan. Rahim is a professor, entrepreneur, investor, and the last Austrian economist of the Austrian School in the direct tradition, and was the first one to teach about Bitcoin at university. Author of fifteen books, he is the founder of scholarium, where the Austrian School can be studied in its original interdisciplinary form.

listen_notes_episodes.title: SEC Crypto Task Force Priorities
listen_notes_episodes.description: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce outlines crypto task force priorities. Coinbase Wallet plans to integrate Farcaster. EigenLayer introduces Level 1 Agents. And the SEC scales back crypto enforcements. Read more: https://ethdaily.io/640

listen_notes_episodes.title: Story Protocol: Tokenizing Intelligence Into Programmable IP Assets - Jason Zhao
listen_notes_episodes.description: We were joined by Jason Zhao, co-founder of Story Protocol, to discuss the inefficiencies of traditional IP frameworks and how Story aims to tokenize intelligence into programmable blockchain assets.
listen_notes_episodes.podcast_name: Epicenter - Learn about Crypto, Blockchain, Ethereum, Bitcoin and Distributed Technologies

listen_notes_episodes.title: Solana Weekly #103 - Ambient is Powering the Future of Environmental Data Through DePIN
listen_notes_episodes.description:
Join us for an insightful conversation with Luca from Ambient, who shares how they're building the world's largest decentralized environmental monitoring network on Solana. Learn about their groundbreaking approach to air quality monitoring, combining blockchain technology with real-world sensors to create a more transparent and rewarding ecosystem.
In this episode, we explore:
• How Ambient manages 8,000+ sensors worldwide
• Their innovative reward system for sensor operators
• Partnerships with major brands like KFC and Best Western
• The upcoming launch of their $190 outdoor sensor
• Their expansion into the Indian market
• The future of environmental data collection
Discover how Ambient is transforming environmental monitoring by incentivizing community participation while providing crucial data for urban planning, property valuation, and public health initiatives.
Guest: Luca from Ambient
Host: Thomas
Website: ambient.network
Twitter: x.com/ambientnetwork
Don't forget to subscribe for weekly updates on the latest developments in the Solana ecosystem!
Note: This content is for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial advice.
Show notes: solanaweekly.fun/episodes
 

This is a public episode. If you would like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit thomasbahamas.substack.com

listen_notes_episodes.title: Block Stars: Intersection of Blockchain and AI
listen_notes_episodes.description: In this special episode of Block Stars, join David Schwartz, CTO of Ripple, and Dimitri Restaino, Senior Solutions Architect at AWS, as they explore the exciting convergence of Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence (AI).  In this dynamic conversation, David and Dimitri dive into how the integration of AI and blockchain technologies is set to revolutionize industries ranging from finance to decentralized applications (dApps). This episode focuses on new opportunities, the challenges of combin...

listen_notes_episodes.title: Crypto & Macro: Tariffs, Fed Signals, and Onchain Evolution
#100 Bybitアプリ規制後の対応策完全ガイド - サコイン村での実践例から
listen_notes_episodes.description:
2025年2月のBybitアプリ規制に対する具体的な対応策を解説。サコイン村での実践例を基に、Chrome拡張機能の活用法やPhantomウォレットへの移行方法、資産保護の具体的な手順をステップバイステップで紹介。これまでBybitアプリを使用していた方必見の完全ガイド。

rss_feed_episodes.title: SP. 科技島讀請回答
rss_feed_episodes.description:
在這個最後的 Q&A 特輯中，兩位主持人回答聽眾對科技島讀與 podcast 最感興趣的問題。題目涵蓋寫作方法、發展特色、身心平衡，以及給迷惘的人的建議。

科技島讀 podcast 歷時 4 年。周欽華要特別感謝盧郁青擔任共同主持人，一起同甘共苦。謝謝房首伊與賴佳翎認真負責，是可靠的後援。謝謝工程師 Joe 總是使命必達，維持系統的穩定。也謝謝聲音製作人陳繹方總是能化腐朽為神奇，把尷尬冷場的錄音剪接得流暢又生動。最後，謝謝聽眾對島讀的支持。

SP：科技島讀周欽華與敏迪一起談寫作 — 敏迪選讀
https://reurl.cc/NrZbRQ

周欽華常用的資訊來源與受肯定的台灣個人媒體

rss_feed_episodes.title: Ep.145 英雄旅程最終章
rss_feed_episodes.description:
科技島讀 4 年旅程的終章，是一篇角色扮演遊戲（Role-playing game，RPG）。主角一開始努力的培養獨特的能力，奮力不被電腦替代。接著他走上創業之路。其創辦的企業一路成長，掙脫價值鏈的限制，建立護城河，最終成為壟斷性的巨頭。此時國家開始打擊他的勢力，而人民的反彈也越來越高。他也突然發現自己享受了科技的果實，卻似乎也失去了最珍貴的東西。

文章：小華不平凡的科技旅程
https://bit.ly/34vsqcV

rss_feed_episodes.title: Ep.144 急速抵達 — Just Kitchen 2 年上市｜來賓 Just Kitchen 營運長吳得暉 & SparkLabs Taipei 合夥人邱彥錡
rss_feed_episodes.description:
從台灣出發的雲廚房 Just Kitchen 是只做外送的餐飲平台。其創立兩年就成功的在加拿大與德國上市，震撼台灣科技業。Just Kitchen 採「中央廚房」與「衛星店」搭配的模式，兩年內快速拓展 15 家衛星廚房，創造 17 個自製品牌，並已跨足至香港與菲律賓。這一個人才濟濟的團隊是如何集結在台灣新創加速器 SparkLabs Taipei？為何選擇從台灣出發？又是如何從種子輪就跳到公開上市？

特別感謝 Just Kitchen 營運長吳得暉（Kent Wu）參與討論。他在美國曾有三次成功的新創出場紀錄，包括賣掉生鮮外送新創 Milks and Eggs 給 Grubhub。

特別感謝 SparkLabs Taipei 管理合夥人邱彥錡（Edgar Chiu）參與討論。他曾在惠普（HP）與 IBM 工作，後成為台灣來電資訊服務 Gogolook 的營運長，以及創立 SparkLabs Taipei。

本集錄音分成兩段。第一段為邱彥錡的訪談。第二段為吳得暉的訪談。

想問科技島讀 podcast 問題？請在 2021 年 6 月 1 日前寫信至  hi@daodu.tech，就有可能由主持人在節目上回答！

文章：跳級上市 — 雲廚房 Just Kitchen 站上國際舞台 
https://bit.ly/3hJH8F7
